item.title: Patrick add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Character is higher than intellect. A great soul will be strong to live as well as think." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Always do what you are afraid to do." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Give all to love; Obey thy heart...." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "No change in circumstances can repair a defect of character." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Be not the slave of your own past - plunge into the sublime seas, dive deep, and swim far, so you shall come back with new self-respect, with new power, and with an advanced experience that shall explain and overlook the old." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Great men, great nations, have not been boasters and buffoons, but perceivers of the terror of life, and have manned themselves to face it." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The world we live in is but thickened light." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Truth is handsomer than the affectation of love. Your goodness must have some edge to it--else it is none." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Do the thing and you will have the power." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Carlos Castaneda
item.description: "The average man is hooked to his fellow men, while the warrior is hooked only to infinity." -- Carlos Castaneda

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "A man should hear a little music, read a little poetry, and see a fine picture every day of his life, in order that worldly cares may not obliterate the sense of the beautiful which God has implanted in the human soul." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "If you would create something, you must be something." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "At the moment of commitment the entire universe conspires to assist you." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "You can’t, if you can’t feel it, if it never Rises from the soul, and sways The heart of every single hearer, With deepest power, in simple ways. You’ll sit forever, gluing things together, Cooking up a stew from other’s scraps, Blowing on a miserable fire, Made from your heap of dying ash. Let apes and children praise your art, If their admiration’s to your taste, But you’ll never speak from heart to heart, Unless it rises up from your heart’s space." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "He who possesses art and science has religion; he who does not posses them needs religion." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Be above it! Make the world serve your purpose, but do not serve it!" -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "If any man wish to write in a clear style, let him be first clear in his thoughts; and if any would write in a noble style, let him first possess a noble soul." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Johann wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Beauty is a manifestation of secret natural laws, which otherwise would have been hidden from us forever. " -- Johann wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Zen Master Dogen
item.description: "Do not be concerned with the faults of other persons. Do not see others' faults with a hateful mind. There is an old saying that if you stop seeing others' faults, then naturally seniors and venerated and juniors are revered. Do not imitate others' faults; just cultivate virtue. Buddha prohibited unwholesome actions, but did not tell us to hate those who practice unwholesome actions." -- Zen Master Dogen

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "The truth is not always beautiful, nor beautiful words the truth." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everyone will respect you." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Samael Aun Weor
item.description: "Those who don't have a wife should sublimate their sexual energies with outdoor sports or long walks." -- Samael Aun Weor

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Samael Aun Weor
item.description: "When the mind stops searching, when it stops wanting refuge, when it no longer goes in search of security, when it no longer craves more books and information, when it ignores even the memory of desire, only then will Love arrive within." -- Samael Aun Weor

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Samael Aun Weor
item.description: "Whoever submits himself to a super-discipline can expect great triumphs." -- Samael Aun Weor

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Samael Aun Weor
item.description: "In life, the only thing of importance is a radical, total, and definitive change. The rest, frankly, is of no importance at all." -- Samael Aun Weor

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle
item.description: "Education never ends, Watson. It is a series of lessons, with the greatest for the last." -- Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

item.title: Patrick add a quote by Horace Mann
item.description: "Be ashamed to die until you have won some victory for humanity." -- Horace Mann
